==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=人生何处不相逢|type=2212}}

===Etymology===
Literally: In life, where will you not run into other people.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=rénshēng héchù bù xiāngféng
|c=jan4 sang1 ho4 cyu3 bat1 soeng1 fung4
|cat=prov
}}

===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# Even if you are separated from somebody by great distances, there is always a chance that you may bump into him someday.
